bibl.title: A Soldier and His God in Lower Nubia: The Mandulis Hymns of Paccius Maximus.
Proceedings of the Sixth International Congress of Graeco-Oriental and African Studies. Nicosia, 30 April - 5 May 1996 (Nicosia, 2000)
bibl.author: BURSTEIN, Stanley M.

bibl.note: Examine les inscriptions gravées par Paccius Maximus, en part. l'hymne à Mandoulis (I. métriques 166). - Non vidimus.
BURSTEIN Stanley M., A Soldier and His God in Lower Nubia: The Mandulis Hymns of Paccius Maximus.

V. CHRISTIDES and T. PAPADOPOULLOS (Edd.), Proceedings of the Sixth International Congress of Graeco-Oriental and African Studies. Nicosia, 30 April - 5 May 1996 (Nicosia, 2000) = Graeco-Arabica 7-8 (1999-2000) pp. 45-50.
